Description:
Easy modern living in low-maintenance villa
Enjoy bright modern living without the maintenance hassles in this three-bedroom brick villa thats ideal for first-home buyers, young families and downsizers. Investors also note the strong rental demand in this popular central location thats moments to bus stops, Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza Leopold, Leopold Memorial Reserve and Gateway Sanctuary, and less than 20 minutes to Geelong CBD.
-- Tiled open-plan living/dining area with split-system air conditioning
-- Modern gas kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
-- Bright master bedroom features a walk-in robe and well-presented ensuite
-- Walk-in robe also to second bedroom; built-in robe to third bedroom
-- Modern main bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet
-- Covered alfresco patio in fenced, low-maintenance rear courtyard
-- Internal laundry with courtyard access; single lock-up garage
A practical floor plan joins easy undercover outdoor entertaining in this quality single-level villa that is set in pretty court setting.
Enter into the reception foyer with the carpeted master bedroom privately located on your right at the front of the home.
Turn left into the open-plan living/dining area that is air conditioned for your year-round comfort and flows onto the covered patio for easy alfresco entertaining.
The adjoining kitchen with large pantry offers everything the home chef needs; the light-filled second and third bedrooms are also carpeted; and the quality continues in the immaculate main bathroom.

Description:
Position Position Position
Build your dream home on this beautifully positioned 582m2 block. The elevation takes in Bay Views including the You Yangs and Geelong.
Located meters from cliff top walks and set amongst luxury homes this block is ready to be built on as all connections are available.
Minutes to supermarkets, schools, beaches, boat ramp, wineries, ferry services and everything the Bellarine lifestyle has too offer you.
Also just 20mins to Geelong this location is picture-perfect.
This location won't last long.

Description:
When Only Quality Will Do
Tucked away in the family friendly and highly sought-after pocket of Leopold, this impressive single-level family home will exceed all of your expectations. Located within close proximity to the popular Gateway Plaza, easy access to Geelong CBD and all of your daily amenities. The tasteful design and quality fixtures featured throughout will impress the most fastidious buyers.
The practical floor plan is intelligent by way of its design, keeping functional daily living and entertaining in mind. You will be instantly impressed by the polished floorboards and near new carpet that flow throughout the home. Offering four spacious bedrooms, main with private ensuite and walk through robe. The remaining bedrooms offer built in robes and utilise the second central bathroom and separate toilet.
The open plan, fully appointed kitchen offers stainless-steel appliances, 900mm upright oven and stove, dishwasher, walk in pantry and an island bench/ breakfast bar that overlook an expansive living and meals area. Completing the floorplan inside is the second separate living area, perfect for the kids to enjoy, the study nook and the full laundry with external access.
On the outside there is nothing do, a great sized backyard that offers a superb undercover entertaining area overlooking the secure gardens, potential side gate access for boat or caravan storage, double remote garage with internal access. Added extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, reverse cycle air conditioning, ceiling fans and double-glazed windows.
No detail has been overlooked and quality is evident from every angle. Truly a dream family home coupled with an enviable lifestyle. This is a must see.

Description:
How's The Serenity!
A truly exclusive and limited opportunity to secure what can only be described as 'blue ribbon' real estate on the Bellarine Peninsula. This character filled residence is a visual delight and a genuine 'one of a kind' prospect... believe me, there is no other like this one! Flanked by the expansive native plantations of Griggs Creek Reserve, sweeping views of the bay through the tree tops, the shoreline only a short stroll away and an abundance of bird life creates an unrivalled tranquility to embrace the ultimate 'sea change'
Showcasing great size and scale this residence presents a myriad of floor plan options
In its current form; x5 bedrooms and an expansive open plan living
The master suite serves up a feeling of resort style living; a beautiful en-suite renovation embodies soothing earthy tones with a dash of luxury (sauna, free standing bath etc)
2 spiral staircases lead to two bedrooms, both possess great proportions and eye catching A frame roof lines
The kitchen boasts a country charm and is complemented by a contemporary flair; expansive stone bench tops, as-new stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar, excellent storage solutions and walk in pantry
The primary living zone of this fine property is one that must be seen to be believed; jaw dropping ceiling scale, slate flooring, Coonara heater, custom timber features and a bespoke suspended boat light feature will no doubt be a 'talking point'
All the modern comforts and an impressive inclusions list... and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
The A+ location simply cannot be overstated; creekside of Kewarra Drive, close proximity to a thriving retail hub, vibrant cafe scene, local award winning wineries, child friendly walk to schools, the waters edge only a short stroll, easy access to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp and set within a green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs
This exceptional property offers a great opportunity. Whether it be your dream home, savvy investment or even a lucrative holiday let prospect. Call today to secure your very own piece of paradise!

Description:
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST - Hidden Slice of Rural Paradise
This one is a hidden piece of rural paradise. Like the current owner says, 'Not many people know about this location. We have the most stunning views of Geelong and beyond to ourselves.' Set on approximately 2.5 acres of well-groomed land in Leopold, the main residence exudes luxury and elegant touches with a second dwelling also available.
With the potential to live off the grid and support a sustainable life the first stages already exist here with 25 solar panels, 50,000lt water tanks that service animal troughs and lavatories, north-facing yard, chicken coops, vegetable garden, orchard, paddock, stockyard and a dam.
Inside there are five bedrooms, all with built-in robes and master showcasing an impressive walk-in dressing room and en suite. Hexagon tiles in the bathrooms are a stand-out, as well as the soaker tub in the main, twin vanities and in-situ showers.
The formal lounge and expansive living room means no-one is under each other's feet. There is ample space for little people to grow into. Neighbouring these spaces is a chef's kitchen that boasts an island stonebench, 900mm stove, five-burner gas hotplates, bi-fold window servery, butler's pantry and Hamptons style cabinetry.
Entertaining surpasses the everyday thanks to an inground solar-heated swimming pool and pool house with an imported Italian pizza oven and built-in barbeque, plus an abundance of lawn, decking for extra seating and firepit area.
A detached self-contained second dwelling has everything available for independent living as well as two offices. This is a valuable asset that could either provide a secondary income via the holiday rental market or country homestays or be of a personal benefit and accommodate ageing parents or teenagers and your home business.
A property like this is a rare find! It has easy access to the heart of Geelong, city of Melbourne and the rest of the Bellarine, you will be relishing in an envious way of life. Gateway Plaza, local schools, kindergartens and public transport are all within close reach.
- Established farm land that is nearby to Lake Connewarre
- Flooded with natural sunlight
- Full outdoor kitchen with barbeque, sink and pizza oven
- Polished jarrah timber floors in main areas
- Neutral tones and classic interiors throughout
- Mud room and laundry next to a double LUG
- Multiple sheds for caravan, boat or machinery storing
- Three phase power in sheds
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Ceiling fans, air-conditioning and central woodfire
- Securely fenced for maintaining livestock
- Close proximity to several town centres and beaches

Description:
1080m2 IN A PRIME LOCATION
This 1970's two storey home with separate cabin on site, is set on a whopping 1080m2 block with nearby facilities and attractions.
Downstairs has formal living with wood fire, kitchen/dining, 3 spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom is located at the rear and offers updated ensuite with shower, toilet and vanity storage plus a handy WIR with built in racking.
The central bathroom offers a bath & shower, vanity storage plus heat lamps for those chilly mornings.
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new gas upright cooker, compact dishwasher and ample cupboard space. The informal meals area is situated perfectly off the kitchen and also offers French doors opening up to the huge entertaining deck.
Upstairs treats you to a second living area with sweeping views of twinkling lights at night. The stairs are accessible directly from outside opening many options for the future.
Entertain friends and family outside with a huge rear yard and undercover deck.
The second dwelling is a self-contained cabin with independent street access with a bedroom, living, kitchen and bathroom. This is currently rented for approx $200+pw or could make for an ideal holiday let pulling approx. $100pn.
This established area of Leopold means a 1 min walk to a Primary School, 5m to a bus stop, 10 min walk to Gateway Plaza, and 15-mins drive to family and surf beaches.
Whether you wish to raise a family, renovate, extend, invest, or subdivide (STCA), this property is one to view.
FEATURES:
Ducted Heating
Zinc Tin Roof
Split System AC
Self-contained cabin
1080m2 approx block

Description:
Spectacular Moolap Lifestyle Property!
An extraordinary opportunity has arisen to purchase one of Moolap's premier lifestyle properties. Set on five fully-fenced acres, this stylish rural retreat perfectly blends traditional and contemporary. Enhanced by quality workmanship, high ceilings and a functional floorplan, families can spread out over three living areas. A formal entrance hall opens into a sweeping formal lounge room, while the open-concept living and dining rooms are ideal for relaxed entertaining with a rear games room. An original kitchen incorporates practical and versatile elements including ample cabinetry, a corner walk-in-pantry, hotplate, under-bench oven and stainless steel dishwasher. Comprising of five bedrooms with built in robes which are served by a family bathroom. An oversized master suite features walk-in robe, built-in-robe and ensuite. A generous games room with built-ins provides a secluded space to relax and unwind. The distinctive design of this home extends to premium accouterments, with dual split system inverters, ceiling fans, double garage with internal access and double carport. The entertainment area is enriched by a Jacuzzi and easy-care faux grass. A detached two-bedroom unit on the property lends itself to a variety of possibilities. This is golden opportunity to live on your property which was formally known as Outback Miniature Farm or have a hobby farm. Alternatively, reap the rewards of a country lifestyle within close proximity of all amenities including primary and secondary schools; shopping centres; Geelong CBD; public transport and the Bellarine Rail Trail.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Premium North Backyard
Moving to the Bellarine is a lifestyle change now enjoyed by many. This block with area 548m2 presents a blank canvas for a substantial new home in a boutique pocket close to the Drysdale and Curlewis shopping centres. Surrounded by new homes and within walking distance to the Clifton Springs Primary School and walking path to the shores of Corio Bay.
Central to all services, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp, Port Phillip Ferry, wineries and cafes of the Bellarine.

Description:
Drysdale Acreage
Located on the outskirts of Drysdale in a quality, rural residential estate. This one acre allotment sits on a slight slope.
Blank canvass is the best way to describe this cleared land.
Central to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp for the avid fisherman, the Portarlington Ferry for that day trip to Melbourne, various wineries and cafes for a leisurely luncheon date, the shopping and commercial centre of Drysdale and the list goes on.
Services to the front of the block.
Call the agent for further details

Description:
Superbly Appointed In Quiet Location
Ideal for those seeking a low maintenance carefree lifestyle within easy reach to a range of services. Light filled living where quality fixtures and fittings are a key feature.
Consisting of four bedrooms, master with WIR, ensuite, and the remaining three bedrooms all with BIRs.
The main family bathroom is easily accessible, complete with bath, shower separate toilet.
Open plan kitchen dining and lounge area leading to outdoor entertaining area. The kitchen with custom cabinetry, stone benchtops, butler's pantry, S/S appliances, dishwasher and extensive storage. A further extra living area/study to the front of the home is also an advantage.
Features include remote garage with secure access, ducted gas heating and freshly painted.
Within easy 5 min walk to Gateway Plaza Leopold, public transport and less than 1 min walk to playground/sporting facilities. 15 mins to Geelong CBD and Bellarine Coastline.
Rent $440pw approx
This perfect home would suit first home buyers, downsizers and investors.

Description:
Attention all Tradies! Industrial Zoning
Within only minutes from the Geelong CBD and sitting on an allotment size of 4047sqm (approx) and with potential for industrial development (all STCA). The property consists of 3 bedrooms, all with ceiling fans. 1 bathroom with claw foot bath and separate shower. Large central kitchen with ample cupboard and bench with a large breakfast bar. The family room situated at the front of the house along with master and second bedroom. Walk through to the rear of the house where the 3rd bedroom is located with BIR. Step out the back door to the massive backyard with 2 garden sheds, sound/music room, deck with built-in chairs to enjoy the sunshine. At the rear of the property is a large 12.2 x 24m shed equipped with 3-phase power, full kitchen, shower and 2 smaller rooms which could possibly be an office if you wish to run your business from home. This is perfect for the tradesman. Add to this, potential annual rental income of $36,400 on both the home & shed combined. Minutes from East Geelong shopping precinct, Eastern Beach, Newcomb Central, schools, sporting facilities and Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Picture Perfect in the Heart of Drysdale
This beautiful family residence is equipped with all the elements that a growing family needs. Located in a desirable Drysdale pocket just moments to all the Drysdale amenities is simply a bonus of this picturesque home.
This inviting Crescent is tucked away in quiet and well presented no through Road. The picket fence and manicured establish gardens exude a warm and inviting entry.
Set across 2 levels, this practical and free flowing floor plan will ensure all members of the family have their space. The ground level is the heart of the home, welcomed with timber floors and adorned with ceiling roses, character fretwork and ¾ feature walls in the living room. Home to the family room with feature fire, study/ versatile 5th bedroom, an updated kitchen including gas cooking and stainless-steel appliances with views of the garden and overlooking the dining area with access out to the undercover area. The laundry and separate toilet complete the lower level. The first floor is home to 4 bedrooms, the master suite with walk-in robe and ensuite, the remaining 3 bedrooms all with robes (bedrooms 3 & 4 with Bay glimpses). A second living area, main bathroom and toilet complete the upper level.
The front and back gardens are manicured and established with plenty of room for the kids to run around. The double carport has a very handy and wide side access leading straight to the oversized double lock up garage.
Features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, additional cooling unit, feature wall heater, roller blinds, an abundance of storage with character features throughout.
A charming home in a sought-after pocket that has been well maintained and ready for you to move into.

Description:
Modern Lifestyle Living
Located in this increasingly popular pocket of Leopold sits this fantastic opportunity. Offering the perfect blend of class and conveniences, an ideal property for the first home buyer, investor or family alike.
With a beautiful street frontage and classic white tones throughout internally, there is nothing more for you to do than walk in and enjoy. This lovely family home boasts a practical, free flowing floor plan and is comprised of four spacious bedrooms. The main bedroom is located at the rear of the home offering privacy and features a walk-through robe with private ensuite, while the three remaining bedrooms have built in robes and share a central bathroom. The large open plan, kitchen, dining and living area opens up onto the covered BBQ area and is complimented by the second lounge located at the front of the home. The kitchen features quality stainless streel appliances with a sizable island bench and ample cupboard space.
The home has a beautifully landscaped rear yard & is perfect for busy families seeking a low maintenance property on a low maintenance block. Other notable features include, central heating and a split system for cooling ensuring your comfort all year round, a remote double lock up garage with secure internal access, well-appointed laundry, and a garden shed outside for extra storage rounding out this great offering.
Within walking distance to all Estuary Estate Parks and recreation areas, the ever-expanding Leopold Gateway Plaza, public transport, quality schools, parks and walking tracks. Also close to the Geelong CBD & stunning Waterfront, ensuring a very convenient lifestyle.

Description:
Family Appeal with Future Prospects!
Not every day does an opportunity like 23 Cameo Court present itself where the location is everything and the astute buyer will enjoy the proximity the home is to the Clifton Springs Golf Club and to the famous Clifton Springs Dell and foreshore.
This versatile property, totalling 821sqm (approx.), presents itself as the perfect opportunity for those looking to break into the first home buyer market or those looking to renovate and invest. The home is a blank palette and with the right amount of imagination could be transformed into something special.
Featuring a classic floor-plan design with 3 bedrooms, 2 spacious living rooms and a practical kitchen, the home is offset with new carpets and existing floorboards. With a side access driveway that has enough space to accommodate a boat and a caravan that leads to a single car garage and a backyard which has more than ample space to create a children's playground or design your own picturesque landscaped garden.
Conveniently located, this well presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centre's close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this fantastic opportunity.

A Solid Foundation

Lock-up garage and a long driveway down the side of the house means there's plenty of room for the boat or caravan.
Located in the heart of Clifton Springs, only a few minutes drive to the boat ramp and Drysdale town centre.

Description:
Great Investment,Great Home
Here is potential to secure a great investment for the future.
Located only a short walk to the Clifton Springs Golf Club and Dell swimming spot. Enjoy a relaxed meal at the Golf Club whilst admiring the beautiful vistas. Address: 38 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
As Pretty As A Picture!
Surrounded by picturesque gardens and showcasing north-facing bay views, this home is an absolute treat!
With the coastline positioned a short stroll from your front door, a relaxed lifestyle is yours to keep. The local shops on Centaurus Avenue are also a short walk away, along with public transport and the Beacon Point Reserve. Young families will appreciate easy access to Clifton Springs Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, and Drysdale Primary School. The Clifton Springs Golf Club and Boat Ramp are within easy reach, while the vibrant hub of Drysdale provides you with a wealth of shopping and dining options.
Every inch of this two-storey weatherboard home is as cute as a button. Upstairs is home to the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which is flooded with natural light and features a pitched timber ceiling. Opening onto the north-facing balcony, youll love admiring the views over the sparkling bay waters towards the You Yangs. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas hob, 900mm stainless steel rangehood).
Three bedrooms with built-in robes (one with external access) occupy the lower level, along with the fresh main bathroom and laundry with external access.
Complete with a brand new en suite, the spacious family room offers immense versatility as a teen retreat or games room. Boasting separate access, this room is also ideal as a bedroom for those who enjoy their independence. Ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fan provide comfort. Lined with established tropical plantings, the sun-drenched alfresco exudes a tropical vibe that is perfect for entertaining. Both the front yard and backyard are graced with established gardens - creating a beautiful oasis that inspires relaxed outdoor living. With the backyard also home to a passionfruit vine, loquat tree, almond tree, lemon tree, and lime tree - you can enjoy fresh produce straight from the branch!
